definition: the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)
to leave hospital/to be discharged from hospital

sentences.english: Only few States continue to maintain a separate chancery court.
sentences.chinese: 只有少數幾個州繼續保持獨立的衡平法院。

sentences.english: Tokens in cash or kind to staff are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 同敬懷仁院禁止所有工作人員接受任何現金或禮物。

sentences.english: It has a Heng Islam Yeshiva of Qinghai in this mosque.
sentences.chinese: 該清真寺內設立有青海阿橫伊斯蘭教經學院。

sentences.english: From 2002, Hospitals Include Sanatoriums and Tend and Protect Hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 從2002年起醫院數中包括療養院和護理院。

sentences.english: The movie Titanic is recording good in Guangming Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 影片《鐵達尼號》在光明影片院十分賣座。

sentences.english: And the workhouses, where poor people can live and work?
sentences.chinese: 還有可供窮人生活和工作的濟貧院呢？

sentences.english: The inmost court was where the priests alone could enter to offer sacrifices.
sentences.chinese: 至於最內部的院，只有祭司纔可進到裏面去獻祭。

sentences.english: The House of Lords is the Upper House of the British Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 貴族院就是英國議會的上院。

sentences.english: Collaboration, like that between Zhang and the Japanese, is rare.
sentences.chinese: 像天津院和日本之間的那種合作是很少的。

sentences.english: The junior and senior of the senate all have driver's licenses.
sentences.chinese: 商討院的年父老以及幼年者都有駕駛執照。

sentences.english: 8226; He ran for the Senate in 1854, and lost.
sentences.chinese: 1854年，他參加國會議院選舉，失敗。

sentences.english: I felt as if I had stepped into an avantgarde theatre production.
sentences.chinese: 我感覺我好像進入了一個前衛戲劇院。

sentences.english: NATO soldiers took some of the wounded to a military hospital.
sentences.chinese: 北約軍人把一些受傷的人送到一家軍醫院。

sentences.english: I was certain I was on the brink of poverty, going to the poorhouse.
sentences.chinese: 我確信自己已處在貧困的邊緣，馬上就要進濟貧院了。

sentences.english: A sculptural, sloping roof unites an underground lobby with the covered inner court.
sentences.chinese: 阿雕塑，坡屋面的地下大廳團結的範圍內院。

sentences.english: He teaches the Bible in theological schools and is a pious Christian.
sentences.chinese: 他在經學院教授聖經，是個虔誠的基督徒。

definition: the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)

the five yuan (administrative branches of government) of the Republic of China under Sun Yat-sen's constitution: 行政院[Xing2 zheng4 yuan4] Executive Yuan, 立法院[Li4 fa3 yuan4] Legislative Yuan, 司法院[Si1 fa3 yuan4] Judicial Yuan, 考試院|考试院[Kao3 shi4 yuan4] Examination Yuan, 監察院|监察院[Jian1 cha2 yuan4] Control Yuan
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
